channel.title: Z525 help urgent
channel.description: whenever ppl on my server do something, like attack an npc the whole server shuts down until i restart it and this is wat it shows in the cmd [code]exception in thread "thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at net.com.codeusa.combat.Playerombat.getMeleeMaxhit(PlayerCombat .java:1204) at net.com.codeusa.model.combat.PlayerCombat.appendNpcDamageMelee(player combat.java:2182) at net.com.codeusa.model.Player.process(player.java:2036) at net.com.codeusa.engine.run(engine.java:212) at java.lang.thread.run(thread.java:619)[/code]
